API_Description: Represents the current horizontal position of the mouse cursor within the PDF document's coordinate space.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'mouseX' suggests it is related to the X-coordinate of the mouse position. In the context of a PDF viewer, this would likely refer to the horizontal position of the mouse cursor within the document.
Returns: A number representing the X-coordinate of the mouse cursor.
Returns_Reason: Since 'mouseX' is a property, it is expected to return a value. Given the context, it would return a numerical value indicating the horizontal position of the mouse cursor.
